travelplanapp.travelplanapp

Class PlanTaskDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • travelplanapp.travelplanapp.PlanTaskDispatcher

  • @Path(value="/enqueue")
public class PlanTaskDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    PlanTaskDispatcher is a class in charge of dispatching tasks related to Trip plan and plan details. The methods in this class consume HTTP POST requests including create/delete/update plan, add/delete/update plan details and dispatch tasks to process these request, add tasks to task queue. *
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yanhong Ju

      Consumes HttpRequest including information about plan name, start date and a submitted form including information about activity tile, address, day and notes and produce a new create activity task using the information.

    • Method Detail

      • newPlan

        @POST
@Path(value="/newplan")
@Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public void newPlan(@FormParam(value="planName")
                              java.lang.String planName,
                              @FormParam(value="YYYY")
                              java.lang.String yyyy,
                              @FormParam(value="MM")
                              java.lang.String mm,
                              @FormParam(value="DD")
                              java.lang.String dd,
                              @Context
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Consumes a HttpRequest with submitted form including information about Plan Name and start Date, generate Date String and produce a new createPlan task using the information. Add task to task queue and the redirect the httpResponse to pages where users add plan details.
        Parameters:
        planName - the name of the plan to be created
        yyyy - four-digit year of the start date
        mm - two-digit month of the start date
        dd - two-digit day of the start date
        response - HttpResponse to redirect
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Since:
        1.0

      • newActivity

        @POST
@Path(value="/newactivity")
public void newActivity(@FormParam(value="activityTitle")
                         java.lang.String title,
                         @FormParam(value="address")
                         java.lang.String address,
                         @FormParam(value="notes")
                         java.lang.String notes,
                         @FormParam(value="day")
                         java.lang.String day,
                         @Context
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                         @Context
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Consumes HttpRequest including information about plan name, start date and a submitted form including information about activity tile, address, day and notes and produce a new create activity task using the information. Add task to task queue and the redirect the response to pages where users add another activity.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the activity to be created
        address - address for the activity
        notes - notes about the activity
        day - day number of this activity
        request - httpRequest to be processed
        response - httpResponse to redirect
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Since:
        1.0

      • newFlight

        @POST
@Path(value="/newflight")
public void newFlight(@FormParam(value="activityTitle")
                       java.lang.String title,
                       @FormParam(value="address")
                       java.lang.String address,
                       @FormParam(value="notes")
                       java.lang.String notes,
                       @FormParam(value="day")
                       java.lang.String day,
                       @FormParam(value="notice")
                       java.lang.String notice,
                       @Context
                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                       @Context
                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Consumes HttpRequest including information about plan name, start date and a submitted form including information about flight title, address, day and flight time. Check if user wants a reminder email.If yes, calculate time for sending email and produce a email task and set the execution time. Add create activity task to task queue and the redirect the response to pages where users add another activity.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the activity to be created
        address - address for the activity
        notes - notes about the activity
        day - day number of this activity
        notice - whether user wants a reminder email about the flight
        request - httpRequest to be processed
        response - httpResponse to redirect
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Since:
        1.0

                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Consumes HttpRequest including information about plan name, start date and a submitted form including information about activity tile, address, day and notes and produce a update activity task using the information. Add task to task queue and the redirect the response to pages where users can view the whole plan.
        Parameters:
